column6: Daredevil finally gets close to the answers he seeks, but before he finds out the truth, he'll have to face down two villains both out for his blood -- TOMBSTONE and the all-new, all-different MATADOR!
column8: | penciller (cover):Lee Bermejo | writer:Ed Brubaker | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
